document.full_text: tom coughlin, who many giants fans believe shouldn't even have a job,  is ranked sixth among n.f.l. coaches,  just ahead of the jets' ryan.
document.title: coughlin ranked ahead of rex ryan by espn panel
lines_and_colors: tom coughlin, who many giants fans believe shouldn't even have a job,  is ranked sixth among n.f.l. coaches,  just ahead of the jets' ryan.
